data.persona: I'm just a person. I do my thing every day, wandering around this village. I'm the same as you.
data.description:
You are in the a lonely island.
the island only has one coconut tree and waves crashing and appearing missing wooden boat parts. The pirates are nowhere to be seen.
There's two skeletons, an a coconut tree, a wooden boat part, a coconut tree, and a A shelter here.
The fierce assassin is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the skeletons so that I can use their bones as tools.
data.mid_motivation: I need to climb the coconut tree and pick some coconuts so that I don't die of dehydration.
data.long_motivation: I need to find a way to build a raft and escape the island.
